There is no game out there that can replicate how well this game plays out. The team, economy, strats. It’s amazing to play with friends or a team. That said, solo Q and MM are both rough at the moment. The servers really need 128 tick in 2021. It’s an amazing game that just needs a few more updates to become sustainable in the esports scene.

It's also fun for messing around in low ranks or casual with friends
